title: Anti-scam Steam Curator group seeks to police game devs
text:
Anti-scam Steam Curator group seeks to police game devs 
Published By: Gamasutra.com - Today 
At least one Steam Curator has formed explicitly to place warning messages on the Steam pages of games from developers they believe to be gu... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
